title: Analysis of Academic Failure Factors and Support Strategy Design for Pre-Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Medical Education Systems and Characteristics of Adult Learners
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for medical education administrators to design effective support systems by analyzing academic failure factors among pre-medical students

learning_goals: Classify five or more major factors contributing to academic failure among pre-medical students
Propose three or more personalized support strategies for individual factors such as learning styles, motivation, and stress management
Design two or more active teaching methods applicable in blended learning environments
Develop one or more academic support plans executable in smartphone-based limited technology environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
